_sText:
De_pyramid_css
	
by
	
GB-UK*switch (birdflipper@hotmail.com)


This map is currently on the GB-UK 40 man public server, swing by there and get it voted on if you want to play it online! The map is set around some pyramids in ruin/desert type scenario. It includes bridges, water, underground passages, sniper positions and of course, double doors!


CTs: Prevent the terrorist scum bags from bombing the ancient Cross of Destiny (site A), and the boxes containing valuable Egyptian artifacts (site B).


Ts: You have two targets here, and bombing either of the two will result in success! Expect heavy resistance from those law abiding CT scum.

GL & HF!




Additonal thanks to flatmates Catalyst and Grogs for ideas throughout the project.
